title: Watch out for these players,......i played a game just recently, and had Ran into hackers!!!!!!!!!!
body:
At first i thought it was at my end, then everyone on my team DC'd, so then we naturally blamed Riot, then it happened again, except we could still see the J4 and Naut attacking teammates and towers, now the lag happened for around maybe 1 min each time, with the same thing us dying and them the only players moving around, now after alot of back and forth, the enemy team said these guys were hacking, had an instance were even the enemy team(excluding J4 and Naut) were level 1, 20 mins in, though i lanned against the ADC and SUPP.

Plain and simple Riot, do something about this issue because i really don't have a problem spending my money on a different game, best believe i will take this info to other popular sites and market your game filled with lag switchers, Boosters, toxic community.Given at the time i wasn't thinking to take screen shots, i was pretty pissed.

this is no isolated incident, they have a clan called Lag Spike, like seriously....
